lead_paragraph: David Kim is the co-founder of FantasyPros, a site that rates the accuracy of fantasy experts and provides tools that aggregate and organize expert advice. You can follow FantasyPros on Twitter.
snippet: A look at the top five prognosticators so far in fantasy football.

headline.main: The Most Accurate Fantasy Experts ... After 3 Weeks

abstract: A look at the top five prognosticators so far in fantasy football.
